Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Waterfront Way, a primary access route to the farms in the east.
Room.LongDescription: Since Eidenhoft Boulevard runs northeast from the intersection to the west, a small wedge is created between the two roads, which has been carefully decorated with trees and shrubs. To the south of Waterfront Way, there is a large building with three shops. Directly to the south is a door with a sign which reads "Treasure Cove Exotic Supplies" in sparkling green letters.
